title: (x) Premiere movie magazine squarish sans - Stainless (custom weight) {Stephen}
content:
Anybody got an ID on this sans font. I like it. Suggestions for similar fonts are welcome too.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [premiere.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/typophile.com/files/premiere.jpg) | 54.53 KB |
| [premiere\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/typophile.com/files/premiere_2.jpg) | 15.6 KB |

 [‹ (x) "America's Elite team of Superhero..." distressed sans - (similar to) Helvetica Cond/Ketchupa {Lex/Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27967 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fitnessphere logo - Corvinus/Skyline/Quirinus {Tiff, Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27970 "Go to next forum topic")
author: peter_monrad

comments.content: It’s a special thin weight of [Stainless](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&displayfontid=FB.111999.0.0&fontRendererText=Legends+of+the+Fall). Coincidentally, that issue of _Premiere_ was going to be featured in FontShop’s [magazine typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053040/http:/www.fontshop.com/virtual/newsletters/jul2006_a/) newsletter, but we ran out of space.
